Package core

Provides the classes for the central game components (namely, those implementing the player, bank, discard pile, number wheel, board, and game master) and the interfaces implemented by some of the classes
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MachineRandom
    Interface representing a game component that requires a machine-generated random number (that is, it does not require any interaction from the player), usually to initialize one or more of its attributes at the start of every game
    PlayerRandom
    Interface representing a game component that requires interaction from the player in generating a random number while the game itself is in motion (for example, the player has to spin a wheel to obtain a random number upon drawing some specific blue cards)
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bank
    Class implementing the Bank of the game
    Board
    Class implementing the board, which consists of the colored spaces where the actual gameplay happens
    DiscardPile
    Class implementing the discard pile, where all drawn and discarded action cards are transferred.
    GameMaster
    Class implementing the game master of That's Life, the central class that provides access to all the methods necessary to play the game
    NumberWheel
    Class implementing the number wheel of the game, which is spun to obtain a random number while the game itself is in motion
    Player
    Class implementing a player of the game
